DOC.brief_title: Louisiana State University Health Care Services Division ( LSUHSCD ) Tele-Health Projects : Weight Loss Chronic Disease Patient Population
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess effect in-home tele-health monitoring health outcome LSUHCSD chronic disease , overweight obese patient diagnose type II diabetes hypertension . Primary emphasis assess effect tele-health home monitoring combine motivational telephone coach weight loss waist circumference compare self-directed , home monitoring alone , telephone coach alone . Secondary outcome blood pressure , Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) , fast blood sugar , cholesterol examine well .
